column5: A bright, sun-filled renovated 1940's home in the historical Hollywood Heights neighborhood of East Dallas. We're close to walking trails and White Rock Lake and within a couple of miles of Downtown, Deep Ellum and the Arts District. We're major art lovers and enjoy designing and caring for our home. We love to cook and invite you to enjoy our kitchen and al fresco dining area! Note: We love our dog - he won't be on property while you are visiting, he'll be with us!
